title: Neighboring Lives
description: Carlyle, Swinburne, John Stuart Mill... Rossetti, Whistler, Lewis Carroll... these and other characters come vividly to life in this extraordinary novel. Set within a few square blocks along the Thames, in Chelsea, Neighboring Lives is a glorious re-creation, based on historical fact, of the private and working lives of many of the nineteenth century's greatest writers and artists.
author: Tom Disch
